name: Cream eBooks
tag_list: ebooks, epub, epub3, digital-books, apps, mobile, html5, touchy-friendly, publishing, publishers, authors, illustration, digital-picture-books, picture-books, interactive-books
overview:
cream eBooks is a very intuitive, easy and fun tool for creating digital books and distribute them across multiple platforms. is also a new digital publishing model.

  • Distribution of digital content across the big players: Amazon, Apple Store, iBook Store, The Copia,Barnes & Noble, 24 Symbols…as well as through the own one.

  • New digital content is showed on multiple devices.

  • Now the authors takes the control, from production to sales. We help them to put their content in the digital market. And they can make a good money.

  • Attractives royalties for authors. up to 50% of the earnings compared with about 10% in the old print model.

offices.address1: STC Spain Tech Center. 181 Fremont Street

video_embeds.description: The Best of the World - Made in ePub3
